text: Kuma wane ne mafi zalunci daga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah, ko kuwa ya ce: "An yi wahayi zuwa gare ni," alhali kuwa ba a yi wahayin kome ba zuwa gare shi, da wanda ya ce: "zan saukar da misalin abin da Allah Ya saukar?" Kuma da ka gani, a lokacin da azzalumai suke cikin mayen mutuwa, kuma mala'iku suna masu shimfiɗa hannuwansu, (suna ce musu) "Ku fitar da kanku; a yau ana saka muku da azabar wulaƙanci saboda abin da kuka kasance kuna faɗa, wanin gaskiya, ga Allah kuma kun kasance daga ayoyinSa kuna yin girman kai
